channel.title: SkyLearn Pre-Filter Test Feed
channel.description: Mixed signal/noise feed to validate Zapier keyword pre-filter

item.title: Landsec relocates headquarters to new London Bridge office
item.description: Landsec has moved into a 180,000 sq ft headquarters on Tooley Street, consolidating its existing West End offices.

item.title: Brookfield signs major lease with global law firm at City tower
item.description: Brookfield Properties has secured a 15-year lease with a leading international law firm at 100 Bishopsgate.

item.title: Kim Kardashian announces new season of Keeping Up With the Kardashians
item.description: The reality TV star confirmed production will begin next spring with streaming set for late 2026.

item.title: England wins World Cup after dramatic penalty shoot-out
item.description: England secured victory over Brazil in an unforgettable World Cup final, ending 59 years of heartbreak.
